text: professor Stephen Hawking you've got
this new communication system what was
wrong with your old system my old system
worked well and I wrote five books lit
including a brief history of time which
lessen the Sunday Times bestseller list
for over five years longer than any
other book the bible and shakespeare
don't count apparently but my old system
had a rather primitive system for
predicting the next word now until has
written a new program a cat which uses
predictive text to speed up writing what
was the thing that you most wanted
changed about the old system it was the
next word predictions I most wanted
changed a cat offers a list of
predictions based on an analysis of the
English language and my previous usage
it also has facilities for handling
email and Internet and for switching
windows and has this new system made a
big change to the way you would it's
only recently that I have had a
relatively about free version of a cat I
expect it will speed up my writing
considerably now the one thing it hasn't
changed is your voice why did you not
want your voice changed as well first I
had was almost unintelligible but then I
brought a speech synthesizer which was
designed for a telephone directory
service that voice was very clear
although slightly robotic it has become
my trademark and I wouldn't change it
for a more natural voice with a British
accent
I am told that children who need a
computer voice 1:1 like my on a wider
question how long have you had an
internet connection and how has that
transformed your life I was one of the
first people to be connected to the
Internet
Paul Ginsberg launched a website XXX
dawdlin got love for physics preference
in 1991 at the start of the internet XXX
sounds like a sex site so it was renamed
art safe dot org there was no Wi-Fi so
connections had to be by cable i had a
mobile phone mounted on my computer for
a dial-up the internet has speeded up
communication and research but at the
higher price of invasion of privacy and
is the internet and modern forms of
communications in general is that a
purely positive development rather
things about it that's then actually
worried you the Internet has brought a
lot of benefits but it has its drawbacks
and dangers such as pornography and
threatening messages according to the
new head of cleac'h view the internet
has become the command center for
criminals and terrorists nor must be
done by the internet companies to
counter threat but the difficulty is to
do this without sacrificing freedom and
privacy now when you watch software
engineers and machine learning experts
at work as they have been on this
project how far along the path to
artificial intelligence do you think we
are intelligence we already have
useful but I think the development of
artificial intelligence could spell the
end of the human race once humans
develop artificial intelligence that
will take off on its own and redesign
itself at an ever-increasing rate
humans who are limited by slow
biological evolution couldn't compete
and what they superseded thank you for
those fascinating insights thank you
very much professor Hawking
